title: Harnessing trace water for enhanced photocatalytic oxidation of biomass-derived alcohols to aldehydes
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02301C, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Wenhua Xue, Jian Ye, Zhi Zhu, Reeti Kumar, Jun Zhao
The presence of moderate water volume enhances the photocatalytic oxidation of 5-hydroxymethylfurfural in acetonitrile, consistently observed across various catalysts and substrates, highlighting its potential for broad application in photocatalysis.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
